name: Traffic game (addictive android games)
description:
Do you want to spend your free time with some best traffic games from the android then here is the best and cool traffic game where you need to escape from the busy traffic of cars to score some high score.In this traffic game you need to swipe up,down,right and left to escape from the incoming and out going traffic.so why you are still waiting down the cool addictive traffic gamesnow to enjoy most.

Download from play store :traffic games
